condition.title: Problem
condition.p: I have a glossgroup that contains multiple glossentry elements and all the entries are referenced using glossref elements inside my map. When I add an abbreviated-form element linked to one of my glossentry elements (using a keyref), the entry is not resolved in the PDF output.

steps-informal.p: Make sure every glossentry has an id. Then, for each glossentry, declare a glossref element like this: <glossref href="concepts/glossary.dita#flowers.genus" print="yes" keys="genus"/>For bookmaps, the glossref elements should be declared in a separate ditamap.
